game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: An ancient temple has been discovered deep in the jungle, and rumors say it holds a powerful artifact. Retrieve it before the rival expedition does!
game.reward: 200 gold coins and a magical amulet

tasks.description: Travel through the dense jungle to reach the ancient temple.
Use your wits to overcome the obstacles and traps within the temple.
Find the artifact and bring it back to Thorne.
